head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DROGHEO, JOSEPH E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DROGHEO, JOSEPH E.

block.p: DROGHEO-Joseph E. On June 26th. Beloved husband of Sara (nee-Crawford). Survived by his daughter Gianna Mitchell, grandchildren Sara and Justin Mitchell, brother Frank Drogheo, sister Margherita Carry and special cousin, Katherine Iaquimto. Funeral service 10:30 Thursday, at The Church of the Blessed Sacrement. We celebrate his life as a great gift of love. In lieu of flowers, contributions in his memory may be made to the American Cancer Society, the America Heart Association or to Memorial Sloan-Kettering Hospital Research Fund.
